Package org.wildfly.security.password.spec

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlgorithmPasswordSpec
    An extension of PasswordSpec where the spec is tied to a specific algorithm.
    PasswordSpec  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BCryptPasswordSpec  
    BSDUnixDESCryptPasswordSpec  
    ClearPasswordSpec  
    DigestPasswordAlgorithmSpec
    A PasswordSpec for a password represented by digesting it with a username and realm as defined by RFC2617 and RFC2831.
    DigestPasswordSpec
    A PasswordSpec for a password represented by a Digest Response as seen in DigestMD5 SASL mechanism.
    EncryptablePasswordSpec
    A password specification for clear passwords which are intended to be encrypted or hashed.
    HashedPasswordAlgorithmSpec
    Algorithm parameter specification for common hashed password types.
    SaltedPasswordAlgorithmSpec
    Algorithm parameter specification for salted hashed password types.
    SaltedSimpleDigestPasswordSpec
    A PasswordSpec for a password represented by a simple digest including a salt.
    ScramDigestPasswordSpec
    A PasswordSpec for a SCRAM digest password.
    SimpleDigestPasswordSpec  
    SunUnixMD5CryptPasswordSpec  
    UnixDESCryptPasswordSpec  
    UnixMD5CryptPasswordSpec  
    UnixSHACryptPasswordSpec
